page.title: 15 OUR NEW LIFE IN PEEBLES(1)
page.content: My Dad's school was at Peterlee near Durham,it was closed down because of the fall of pupils. He was the headteacher and could not face being moved to Hartlepool or Newcastle so he applied for a job in Penicuik and was successful. Penicuik was his home town and he had lived in Durham for twenty years so it was difficult trying to get used to the idea that we would have to move back to Penicuik. We put our house up for sale and after a worrying five months, it was sold. Then we had to find a house. I was so cross at having to move, I cut the sale sign down but it did no good. We moved over to Penicuik and we stayed with our Gran for about three months (continued).
